main-text:
Flight instructions to red five

1. Your  x  wing  is  equipped  with an
   invisible deflector shield that will
   protect you for 9 collisions.

2. Deflector  strength  is  lost when a
   fireball impacts your shield or when
   you  strike a laser  tower or trench
   catwalk.

3. Aim your  lasers  with the cursor to
   explode empire  tie  fighters, laser
   tower tops and trench turrets.

4. Shoot fireballs  before  they impact
   your shield.

5. The rebel force  is depending on you
   to stop the empire by blowing up the
   death star.
